column4: Does anyone know why when I put in a cd it can't read it? says there is no media
Does anyone know why when I put in a cd it can't read it? says there is no media
I think maybe linux doesn't detect your CDRom
hm, btw, can you describe your problem again? Do you mean the CD icon doesn't change if you insert cd into it?
how abotu audio cd? other kinds of cd?
I think your linux doesn't set your CDRom drive up properly, try reboot with CDRom taken off
do you want me to boot without the cdrom drive then with it?
try this excellent applet in gnome
right click gnome panel and select add to panel
I got them mounted with --force, but if it happens again I will try with that
